Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component

Class Spawner

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.Spawner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component

    public class Spawner
extends java.lang.Object
implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
    Provides clones of entity templates between 2 radii around some position.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spawner

        public Spawner​(float minRadius,
               float maxRadius,
               float interval,
               dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.WeightedDistribution<java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Iterable<dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component>>> templates)
        Constructs a new spawner.
        Parameters:
        minRadius - radius past which clones are spawned
        maxRadius - radius within which clones are spawned
        interval - minimum seconds between spawns when active; negative implies inactive with abs(interval) interval
        templates - generators of randomly-selected templates to clone and spawn; each template should contain a Transform where non-zero position components denote axes to randomize

    • Method Detail

      • spawn

        public java.lang.Iterable<dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component> spawn​(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector origin,
                                                                                 float dt)
        Creates, positions, and returns a template clone.
        Parameters:
        origin - point around which to randomly position clone
        dt - seconds since last invocation of this method
        Returns:
        random template clone randomly positioned around origin, or null if inactive or the last invocation of this method happened within the spawn interval

        public boolean isActive​()
        Returns:

        Parameters:
